summary: Feature request to support loading workflow execution history from tctl/web JSON exports in the replayer by leveraging proto JSON serialization with json-module output.
userImpact: Users can replay workflow histories exported from tctl/web UI without manual conversion, improving testing and debugging workflows.
proposedFix: Use proto JSON serialization to load history from tctl/web JSON exports directly in the replayer
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and marked as done
keyQuote: Now that we're compiling our protos using `json-module` output we should be able to use proper proto json serialization.
